ygData.subject: RE: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: A wizard without his or her buffs is quickly killed. Throw a few cancel magic s on a KS ing Wiz.  Watch how fast the tables turn. Joatmos ... From:	Patrick
ygData.messageBody:
A wizard without his or her buffs is quickly killed.
Throw a few cancel magic's on a KS'ing Wiz. Watch how fast the tables turn.

Joatmos


-----Original Message-----
From: Patrick Myers [mailto:chrisstauf@...]
Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 8:01 PM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Kill Stealing

From: "Patrick Myers" <chrisstauf@...>

I remember about a week ago, someone mentioned using the spell cancel magic
to prevent kill stealing. Does anybody know more about this, or have had any
exp with this. The trade window trick someone gave me seems to work ok, but
I would love more tactics.


Chrisstauf of the Lightbringers guild
cleric of the 14th circle
Karana server
